bibl.title: A Late Christian Ostracon from Dongola.
bibl.note: 12th-13th century. - Magical ostracon [Greek] which was probably deposited near the threshold of a door or near the bed-side of a girl named Arinji.

bibl.title: Nubian Voices. Studies in Christian Nubian Culture

bibl.seg: Adam Łajtar & Jacques van der Vliet, A Late Christian Ostracon from Dongola.

Adam Łajtar & Jacques van der Vliet (edd.), with the assistance of Grzegorz Ochała & Giovanni Ruffini, Nubian Voices. Studies in Christian Nubian Culture = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XV (Warsaw, 2011) pp. 133-140, 2 figg.
12th-13th century. - Magical ostracon [Greek] which was probably deposited near the threshold of a door or near the bed-side of a girl named Arinji.
